meanings.definition: A method of solving problems or generating ideas by spontaneously contributing a large number of ideas in a group setting.
meanings.sent1: During the brainstorming session, everyone shared their creative ideas.
meanings.sent2: Brainstorming is a common practice in team meetings to come up with new solutions.
meanings.sent3: The brainstorming session turned into a fun competition of who could think of the most ideas.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a storm of brainstorming, lightning bolts of creativity striking left and right.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with energy as the brainstorming process sparked innovative thoughts.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in a group discussion to generate ideas or solutions.
meanings.sent1: We had a productive brainstorming session that led to some great suggestions.
meanings.sent2: Effective brainstorming requires active participation from all team members.
meanings.sent3: The brainstorming meeting felt like a friendly chat with a purpose.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of ideas, their brainstorming stood out like a lighthouse in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The power of brainstorming lies in the collective wisdom of the group.
